1.content:
1. Systems Architect View — Reduce What Gets Sent to the LLM
Core Principle

Never resend full history. Send only diffs.

Actions

Store canonical state in Supabase / GitHub

Send Claude only:

File diffs

Incremental logs

Task deltas

Avoid sending:

Full repo snapshots

Entire chat history

Large unchanged files

Token Savings

60–90% reduction

2. DevOps View — Checkpoint Instead of Re-Explaining
Replace memory with external state checkpoints
Store externally:

Task state JSON

System summary snapshot

Agent outputs

Decision logs

Claude only receives:
Last checkpoint summary + delta since last step

Benefit

Claude never needs full context again.

3. Backup & DR (Disaster Recovery) Expert — Log Events, Not Conversations
Instead of backing up chats:

Back up events

File changed

Prompt intent hash

Output artifact

Commit SHA

Timestamp

Rebuild strategy

Reconstruct the day from event replay, not raw token logs.

I will make the strategy document summary today and see if I can add more detail to help you with context for our
many n8n workflows that have potential to be great.  We will offer services to these businesses/independent sales
people/trade companies in lead generation, visibility (website, content, payment taking, contact forms, sales
training, call outreach and incoming answering services, more), invoice handling, CRM-task workflows, lowering their
admin staff in many ways.  For today, I think we need to get a few more of our tech stack connected for this goal.  The one we are missing that you are going to be great with and assign agents to, is apify.  if we have apify to scrape data and we connect a voice agent to do automated outreach, we can run a workflow with an added script to start marketing while we build to get some feedback from clients and monetize early.

The presentation will include our findings of the "mystery shopper" call to see how phones are answered and the interaction currently when the business does receive the call and interacts with clients (to offer an easy calculation on our offer page of what is needed now and immediate payback of working with us (High ROI)).
